detail_desc: Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
All-in-one suit in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Swim shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Sturdy denim shorts in a relaxed fit. High waist with covered elastication at the back, a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets, back pockets and straight legs with a pleat at the front. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Lined, flounced bikini top with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable fastener at the back.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, raw edges and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pyjama bottoms in lightweight fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some alpaca wool in a slightly wider fit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric. Slightly longer at the back.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Short jumper knitted in a wool and cashmere blend with a stand-up collar and textured-knit shoulder sections. Visible, decorative stitching at the front, back and hem.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a print motif.
Coat in soft pile with a collar, press-studs down the front and patch front pockets. Lined.
Mesh trainers with imitation leather and imitation suede sections, a padded top edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and fluted thermoplastic rubber (TPR) and rubber soles.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in a soft, textured organic cotton knit with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Fine-knit, V-neck jumper with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in woven fabric with lace and decorative ties at the front, elastication at the top and short sleeves.
Pyjamas in a soft cotton weave. Long-sleeved shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and buttoned cuffs. Short shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.

Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the joggers is partly recycled.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a top and pair of trousers in sturdy, textured organic cotton jersey. Top with buttons at the back of the neck, long raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Trousers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Vest top in ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Trousers woven in an airy Tencel™ lyocell blend with a high waist, two detachable belts with metal D-rings and a zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Side pockets, welt back pockets, pleats at the top and wide, gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Slim-fit jeans in washed superstretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 2x-12xY), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Fine-knit, knee-high football socks in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication at the top, ankle and foot for best fit. Double layer underneath for extra cushioning.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
Court shoes in satin with rounded toes, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform 3 cm, covered heels 12.5 cm.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing at the waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Round sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Playsuit in a viscose weave with lace details, a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and short legs with wrapover sides. Unlined.

Bikini set with a triangle bikini top and bikini bottoms. Top with a flounce at the front, removable inserts, narrow frill-trimmed shoulder straps and ties at the back. Bikini bottoms with a flounce at the top, high-cut legs and a low waist.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in a sturdy cotton weave with a collar, buttons at the top and open chest pockets. Low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Seam at the waist with pleats at the front, shaping darts at the back and a detachable tie belt. Relaxed fit with a zip fly and tapered legs with flap patch pockets. Unlined.
Ribbed yoga top in fast-drying jersey with long sleeves, a wrapover front and wide ties at the waist.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail. The polyester content of the scrunchie is partly recycled.
Leggings in patterned jersey with flatlock seams and a high waist with covered elastication.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Fully lined sports bralette in fast-drying functional fabric. Narrow cut at the top and a racer back.

Jacket in washed denim with metal buttons, a pile-lined collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets and buttoned cuffs. Pile lining. The jacket is made partly from recycled cotton.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and a low crotch.
Short, fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a round neck and short sleeves.
Dog jumper in a soft knit with contrasting colour pompoms on the back, a ribbed collar and ribbing around the front legs and back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
5-pocket shorts in a stretch cotton weave with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs. Slim fit.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Short-sleeved top. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Half-string body in microfibre and lace with a deep V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps that join in a lace section at the back, and a lined gusset with press-studs.

Loose-fitting blouse in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pocket. Dropped shoulders, wide sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, decorative, covered buttons at the cuffs and a tie belt. Lined.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 50x50 cm.
Short, straight-cut dress in sturdy cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and short, frilled sleeves. Unlined.
Glasses chain in metal decorated with shell-shaped beads in metal and plastic. The chain can also be worn as a necklace. Length 81 cm.
Wide waist belt in sturdy fabric with a covered, rectangular buckle. Width 6.5 cm.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim made from a cotton blend with a regular, adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.

Short-sleeved shirt in an Oxford cotton weave with a button-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, an open chest pocket and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Smartphone case in transparent plastic with pressed flowers. Fits iPhone 6-8.
Rain jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a drawstring hood, press-studs down the front, flap front pockets with a press-stud and long raglan sleeves. Unlined.

Padded outdoor trousers in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reinforced hems, a reinforced back and adjustable elastic braces. Zip fly and press-stud, elasticated hems, a reinforced elastic strap under the feet and a reflective strip on one leg. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
V-neck top in woven fabric with spaghetti shoulder straps.

Short biker jacket in sweatshirt fabric with raw edges, a drawstring hood, diagonal zip, press-studs on the lapels and ribbed cuffs. Zipped chest pocket and side pockets, and a small flap pocket at the front with a press-stud.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Short sleeves with smocked trims and smocking at the top and hem.

Lined triangle bikini top with wavy, overlocked edges and padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, wide elastic at the hem and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Trousers in a patterned viscose weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide, slightly shorter legs.
Long metal earrings with plastic pendants in various shapes. Length approx. 12 cm.
Aviator-style sunglasses with thin metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Straight-cut jersey top with short, frill-trimmed sleeves.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a gathered frills around the neckline and sleeves.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, fake pockets at the front, real pockets at the back and skinny legs.
Non-wired lace bralette with lined triangle cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back. No fasteners.
Wide, ankle-length jeans in washed, lightweight cotton denim with an elasticated waist and pockets in the side seams.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sarong in an airy patterned weave with short fringing along the edges. Can be worn in three different ways: around the hips, as a dress or as a wrapover top. Size 120x190 cm.
Short, A-line skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and concealed zip in one side.
Shorts in a softly draping viscose weave with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist and pockets in the side seams.
Round-necked jumper in soft, rib-knit cashmere with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Longer down jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, small stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, and concealed elastication at the cuffs and hem. Filling 80% down, 20% feathers.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Jacquard-patterned jacket in slub-weave cotton canvas with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, discreet side pockets and buttons at the cuffs.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Platform trainers with lacing at the front, cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform 3.5 cm.
Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist.
